With President @BarackObama and the King at the American Cemetery in Waregem http://t.co/JLzbkuN0P8
'We are gathered today to remember the millions of soldiers and civilians who died during the First World War, in #Belgium and in Europe'
'And here in Waregem, to especially remember the Americans who lost their lives in our cities and our countryside'
'On behalf of #Belgium, I wish to honor their memory and thank them and their families for their terrible sacrifice'
'We, the Belgian and the American people, share and cherish the same values ​​of freedom, democracy and progress'
'We have to continue to draw lessons from the terrible war. Those who ignore the past are taking the risk to re-live it
'The guns fell silent long ago, as did the voices of the fallen soldiers. But their example will always continue to inspire us'

Today's #EUUS summit agenda includes #Ukraine, Free Trade Agreement #TTIP, climate, energy and data protection: http://t.co/QK5pUpkTHN

Q & A with the Bavarian Business Association in Munich, talking #CETA and ways we can strengthen trade. #cdnpoli http://t.co/DPTGV4Jaqa
Strong, coordinated #EUUS position #Ukraine; for EU side I refer to last week’s European Council: http://t.co/E6r0N1IhSC #UnitedForUkraine
First priority is to de-escalate. Good signs: meeting of Russian & Ukrainian Foreign Ministers, and Russian support #OSCE mission #Ukraine.
In case of further escalation, EU & US are ready to intensify sanctions. Means to an end: negotiated solution. #UnitedForUkraine
We also stand by #Georgia and #Moldova; EU has brought forward the signing of Association Agreements to June.
Today we also discussed negotiations with #Iran, humanitarian tragedies in #Syria & #CAR, and the appalling mass death sentence in #Egypt.
#EUUS summit: #TTIP v. important to increase potential for growth. Every day both sides trade €2.2 billion. Will be agreement amongst equals
Economy major focus today; focus on stronger economic fundamentals & jobs. Shared #EUUS commitment ambitious transatlantic trade deal #TTIP.
We also talked about energy security & reducing Europe’s dependency on Russian gas, as well as EU ambitions upcoming climate negotiations.
We spoke about European concerns re: US surveillance programmes. EU & US to take further steps to address concerns & restore trust.
#DataProtection: umbrella agreement by this Summer: equal treatment EU & US citizens. US also agreed to a review of #SafeHarbour framework.
#Montenegro leader in region when it comes to #EU accession process, MEPs highlight http://t.co/NepCU2hyDt @Europarl_EN @EduardKukan
.@EU_enlargement's Lange speaks on #Montenegro's #EU accession at EU-MNE Stabilisation & Association Parl. Committee http://t.co/OmQCaLfcBB
We are decided to engage in all global issues, from free #trade to achieving the #millenniumdevelopmentgoals and to #climateaction. #EEUS
At the same time we will also be firm in defending common values: #peace, #freedom, rights of the individual, rule of law, itl law. #EUUS
#EUUS are working together to make sure that unacceptable actions will bear serious consequences. In this spirit working on #Ukraine.
We also discussed the importance of #energy. Our teams are going to meet already next week to discuss #energy cooperation between #EU & #US.
